= Getting Started =

== Checkout Source ==

   * Checkout source for this project. See http://code.google.com/p/pdf-pub-tools/source/checkout

== Build Tools ==

   * Import pdf-pub-tools project into Eclipse IDE as an existing Java project.
   * Build project.

  

== Usage ==

   * Start Open Office in "headless" mode
   * Run Book Publisher or related tool using Eclipse launchers.

Note: Some tools require OO in headless mode, some do not.

See [Usage]
